powers.description: The namespace and IDs of the powers this origin should have.

icon.description: The item stack which is displayed as the icon for the origin in the top-left corner of the choose/view origin screen.

unchoosable.description: If set to true, this origin will not show up in any origin layer to choose it, but it will still be able to be set for that layer with a command or via an origin upgrade.

order.description:
Specifies the position of this origin in the choose origin screen among the other origins with the same impact in the layer.
If not specified, will be a really large number - basically adding it in the end.

impact.description: Specifies the impact of this origin with a number from 0 (none) to 3 (high).

name.description: The display name of the origin. Can be a translation key which is localized in a language file, or the literal display name.

description.description: The description of the origin. Can be a translation key which is localized in a language file, or the literal description.

upgrades.description: A list of upgrades for this origin, specifying which advancements turn this origin into which other origin.

items.description: An Object used to specify an upgrade of an origin within an Origin JSON.

condition.description: The namespace and ID of an advancement which should trigger this upgrade.

origin.description: The namespace and ID of an origin the origin with this upgrade should upgrade to.

announcement.description:
A text which will show up in the local chat of the player in a pretty color.
If none is specified, there won't be a message.
